sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.pdBnftCalcFormulaSel')" @backTo="back"/>

    <el-form ref="productBnftForm" :model="productBnftForm" label-width="auto">
      <cus-form-title :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.pdBnftCalcOpt')"></cus-form-title>
      <el-row :gutter="10" justify="center" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.productDetailType')">
            <cus-select v-model="productBnftForm.productType" :codetype="'ProductCategory'"
                        @change="productDetailTypeChanged"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.specifiedProduct')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointProduct" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable
                       filterable @change="findBnftByIdC">
              <el-option v-for="product in productOptionList" :key="product.id"
                         :label="product.pdCode+':'+product.pdName" :value="product.id">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.designatedSupport')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointBnft" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable
                       filterable @change="findBnftDttailByBnft">
              <el-option v-for="item in Options1" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" type="flex">
        <el-col v-if="pdBnftOptions.id" :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.designatedSupportDetails')">
            <el-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointBnftDT" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable
                       filterable>
              <el-option v-for="item in Options2" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')">
            <cus-select v-model="productBnftForm.appointExpressionType" :codetype="'ruleBusinessDetailClass'"
                        disabled></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')">
            <el-col>
              <el-input v-model="productBnftForm.pdCalcCode" clearable></el-input>
            </el-col>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row class="row-bg" justify="center" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
        <el-col :span="8"></el-col>
        <el-col :span="8" style="text-align: right">
          <el-form-item>
            <el-button icon="el-icon-search" size="small" type="primary" @click="handleSearch">
              {{ $t('bnftFormulaSelect.search') }}
            </el-button>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.bnftFormula')"/>
    <el-table ref="ruleTable" :data="ruleTable" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row
              max-height="300" size="mini" @row-click="rowClick">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" type="index" width="50"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" width="80">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :filter-method="filters_method" :filters="filters_pdCode" :label="$t('rule.product')"
                       align="center"
                       min-width="200" prop="pdCode">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdCode ? scope.row.pdCode + ':' + scope.row.pdName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.guaranteeItem')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftCode ? scope.row.pdBnftCode + ':' + scope.row.pdBnftName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        v-if="calculationFormulaType === '17' || calculationFormulaType === '20' || calculationFormulaType === '21' || calculationFormulaType === '27' || calculationFormulaType === '28'"
        :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.guaranteeDetails')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftDTCode ? scope.row.pdBnftDTCode + ':' + scope.row.pdBnftDTName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.formulaDetial')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.formulaDetial')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdCalcCode">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdCalcCode }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.calcDesc')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('bnftFormulaSelect.rulesAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          <el-button v-auth="'BnftAmountFormula:associate'" icon="el-icon-connection"
                     size="small" type="primary" @click="handleSelectFormula(scope.row)">
            {{ $t('bnftFormulaSelect.option') }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="ruleTable" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5"
                    :params="params" url="/BnftAmountFormula/base/findAllAmountFormula"/>

    <!-- 规则引擎公式定义弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-definition :attributeObj="attributeObj" :ruleDefinitionClosed="ruleModuleClosed"
                         :visible="formulaVisible"></cus-rule-definition>

    <!-- 公式查看弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="formulaView.flag" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="ruleMakeClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>
import {associate, findAllProductByDetailType, findBnft} from "@/api/basicinfo/bnftAmountFormula"
import {getRuleCode} from "@/api/basicinfo/pdtemppdinsuageinfo"
import {findBnftDttailByBnft} from '@/api/basicinfo/acceptInsuranceRules'

let _this

export default {
  name: 'bnftFormulaSelect',
  props: {
    guaranteeDetails: {
      type: Array,
      default: undefined
    },
    calculationFormulaType: {
      type: String,
      default: undefined
    },
    pdUwSiTypeOptions: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return {}
      }
    },
    pdBnftOptions: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return {}
      }
    },
    productCalcRevisionShowINfo: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      filters_pdCode: [],
      attributeObj: {},
      formulaVisible: false,
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        performType: '',
        visible: false
      },
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdStartDateRule: '',
        pdStartDateMode: '',
        pdStartPeriod: undefined,
        pdStartPeriodUnit: '',
        pdEndDateRule: '',
        pdEndDateMode: '',
        pdEndPeriod: undefined,
        pdEndPeriodUnit: '',
        pdGracePeriod: undefined,
        pdObservationDay: undefined,
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        pdStartDate: undefined,
        pdStopDate: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      form_rule: {
        ruleBussModuDeta: '',
        description: ''
      },
      params: {
        product: undefined,
        current_pdBussId: undefined,
        eq_productDetailType: '',
        eq_pdInfoId: undefined,
        eq_pdBussDetailType: '',
        eq_pdBnftId: '',
        eq_pdBnftDTId: '',
        like_pdCalcCode: ''
      },
      pdUwSiType: '',
      tableData_formula: [],
      productOptionList: [],//产品数组
      Options1: [],//保障数组
      Options2: [],//保障明细数组
      ruleTable: [],
      selectedFormula: {},
      columnDetails: {},
      productBnftForm: {
        product: '',
        productType: '',
        productBigType: '',
        bnftType: '',
        bnftDtType: '',
        bnft: '',
        bnftDt: '',
        ExpressionType: '',
        appointProduct: '',
        appointBnft: '',
        appointBnftDT: '',
        appointExpressionType: '',
        pdCalcCode: ''
      }
    }
  },
  watch: {
    ruleTable() {
      // pdCode 筛选
      this.filters_pdCode = []
      for (const row of this.ruleTable) {
        if (!row.pdCode) continue
        let filterItem = {text: '', value: ''}
        filterItem.text = row.pdCode + ':' + row.pdName
        filterItem.value = row.pdCode
        if (!this._.includes(this._.map(this.filters_pdCode, 'value'), filterItem.value)) {
          this.filters_pdCode.push(filterItem)
        }
      }
    }
  },
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    }
  },
  mounted() {
  },
  async created() {
    this.initProductInfo()
    this.productBnftForm.product = this.product.pdCode + ":" + this.product.id
    this.productBnftForm.bnftDtType = this.guaranteeDetails
    this.productBnftForm.ExpressionType = this.calculationFormulaType
    this.productBnftForm.appointExpressionType = this.calculationFormulaType
    this.productBnftForm.bnftType = this.guaranteeDetails[0]
    if (Object.keys(this.pdUwSiTypeOptions).length > 0) {
      this.productBnftForm.bnft = this.pdUwSiTypeOptions.pdBnftCode + ":" + this.pdUwSiTypeOptions.pdBnftType + ":" + this.pdUwSiTypeOptions.id
    }
    if (Object.keys(this.pdBnftOptions).length > 0) {
      if (this.guaranteeDetails[0] === 'C') {
        this.productBnftForm.bnftDt = this.pdBnftOptions.pdClmBnftCode + ':' + this.pdBnftOptions.id
      } else {
        this.productBnftForm.bnftDt = this.pdBnftOptions.pdSrvlBnftCode + ':' + this.pdBnftOptions.id
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    ruleModuleClosed() {
      this.formulaVisible = false
      this.handleSearch()
    },
    ruleMakeClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_formulaSelect2', false)
    },
    productDetailTypeChanged(val) {
      this.productBnftForm.appointProduct = ''
      this.productOptionList = []
      findAllProductByDetailType(this.buildRequestData({productDetailType: val})).then(response => {
        this.productOptionList = response.data
      })
    },
    //显示保障项数组
    findBnftByIdC(val) {
      this.Options1 = []
      this.Options2 = []
      this.productBnftForm.appointBnft = ''
      this.productBnftForm.appointBnftDT = ''
      if (val) {
        let params = {
          pdInfoId: val,
          pdBnftType: this.productBnftForm.bnftDtType[0],
          pdBnftDetailType: this.productBnftForm.bnftDtType[1]
        }
        findBnft(this.buildRequestData(params)).then(res => {
          let data = res.data
          data.forEach(val => {
            this.Options1.push({
              key: val.pdBnftCode,
              value: val.pdBnftCode + ":" + val.pdBnftType + ":" + val.id,
              label: val.pdBnftCode + ":" + val.pdBnftName
            })
          })
        })
      }
    },
    getCaption(obj, state) {
      const index = obj.lastIndexOf(":")
      if (state === 0) {
        return obj.substring(0, index)
      } else {
        return obj.substring(index + 1, obj.length)
      }
    },
    initProductInfo() {
      let pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
      if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
        Object.assign(this.product, pdtempPdInfo)
        this.productBnftForm.productBigType = this.product.bType
        this.productBnftForm.productType = this.product.cType
        this.productDetailTypeChanged(this.product.cType)
      } else {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('rule.invalidProductInfo'))
      }
    },
    //显示保障明细项数组
    findBnftDttailByBnft(row) {
      this.Options2 = []
      this.productBnftForm.appointBnftDT = ''
      if (!this.pdBnftOptions.id) {
        return
      }
      if (row) {
        let data = {
          pdBnftCode: this.getCaption(this.getCaption(row, 0), 0),
          pdBnftType: this.getCaption(this.getCaption(row, 0), 1)
        }
        findBnftDttailByBnft(data).then(res => {
          let data = res.data
          if (data.length) {
            if (this.getCaption(this.getCaption(row, 0), 1) === 'C') {
              data.forEach(val => {
                this.Options2.push({
                  key: val.pdClmBnftCode,
                  value: val.pdClmBnftCode + ':' + val.id,
                  label: val.pdClmBnftCode + ":" + val.pdClmBnftName
                })
              })
            } else {
              data.forEach(val => {
                this.Options2.push({
                  key: val.pdSrvlBnftCode,
                  value: val.pdSrvlBnftCode + ':' + val.id,
                  label: val.pdSrvlBnftCode + ":" + val.pdSrvlBnftName
                })
              })
            }
          }
        })
      }
    },
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    handleSearch() {
      //分页传输数据
      this.params.product = this.product
      this.params.current_pdBussId = this.pdBnftOptions.id ? this.pdBnftOptions.id : this.pdUwSiTypeOptions.id
      this.params.eq_productDetailType = this.productBnftForm.productType
      this.params.eq_pdInfoId = this.productBnftForm.appointProduct
      this.params.eq_pdBussDetailType = this.productBnftForm.appointExpressionType
      this.params.eq_pdBnftId = this.getCaption(this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.appointBnft, 1), 1)
      this.params.eq_pdBnftDTId = this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.appointBnftDT, 1)
      this.params.like_pdCalcCode = this.productBnftForm.pdCalcCode
      this.$refs.page.reload()
    },
    toAddFormula() {
      const param = {
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.calculationFormulaType
      }
      if (!this.calculationFormulaType) {
        param.pdBussDetailType = this.productBnftForm.ExpressionType
      }
      getRuleCode(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        this.attributeObj = {
          code: response.data,
          ruleBussModu: '2',
          ruleBussModuDeta: this.calculationFormulaType,
          ruleType: '2',
          ruleAttr: '2',
          pdType: '1',
          riskType: this.productBnftForm.productBigType,
          riskDetail: this.productBnftForm.productType,
          pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
          pdEdition: this.product.pdEdition
        }
        this.formulaVisible = true
      })
    },
    rowClick(row, column, event) {
      if (event.target.nodeName === "INPUT") {
        if (row.id === this.productBnftForm.id) {
          this.columnDetails = row
        }
      }
    },
    handleSelectFormula(row) {
      let PdtempPdCalc = {
        pdInfoId: this.product.id,
        pdVerId: this.product.pdVerId,
        pdType: '',
        pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.calculationFormulaType,
        pdBussId: '',
        pdBussCode: '',
        pdStructureType: '',
        pdCalcCode: row.pdCalcCode,
        pdCalcDesc: row.pdCalcDesc
      }
      if (this.productBnftForm.bnftDt) {
        if (this.productBnftForm.bnftType === 'C') {
          PdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '02'
        } else {
          PdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '04'
        }
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussId = this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.bnftDt, 1)
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussCode = this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.bnftDt, 0)
      } else {
        PdtempPdCalc.pdStructureType = '01'
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussId = this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.bnft, 1)
        PdtempPdCalc.pdBussCode = this.getCaption(this.getCaption(this.productBnftForm.bnft, 0), 0)
      }
      const param = {
        selectedFormula: row,
        pdtempPdCalc: PdtempPdCalc,
        product: this.product,
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.calculationFormulaType,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let successFlag = response.data.flag
        let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
        if (successFlag === true) {
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          this.handleSearch()
          this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', this.calculationFormulaType, pdtempPdCalc.pdBussCode, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('bnftFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
              let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
              this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              this.handleSearch()
              this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', this.calculationFormulaType, pdtempPdCalc.pdBussCode, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('bnftFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
